user_stories.result: I can make sure I find the best offers

user_stories.result: I can see more details on it

user_stories.result: I can access it later

user_stories.result: I can show it at stores so they know I'm a member

user_stories.result: I can keep it up to date

user_stories.result: I can continue paying my membership

user_stories.result: I can create an account

user_stories.result: their ticket is confirmed

user_stories.result: I can confirm the order

user_stories.result: the customer can select from where to see the event

user_stories.action: start an order for a customer
user_stories.result: I can help them get their ticket

acceptance_criterions.description: Given that I am selling a ticket to a customer. When I select from one of the pricing categories. Then I should place an order and I should get the time that order started.

user_stories.action: to be able to select tickets to buy from the available Pricing Groups for that event
user_stories.result: I can select from the different available prices and locations

acceptance_criterions.description: Given that the selected event has several tickets prices. When I want to choose from one of those prices. Then I should see how much does each ticket costs, and the name of the pricing category.

user_stories.action: to be able to see the Event Sales for an event
user_stories.result: I can start buying tickets for customers

acceptance_criterions.description: Given that I log in. When I select an event from the List. Then I can see a detail view for that event, and I can see the options to start selling tickets to customers.

user_stories.action: to be able to select from the list of current events
user_stories.result: I can help people on a specific concert

acceptance_criterions.description: Given that I log In, When there are events coming soon, Then I should be able to see a list of all of them, and I should be able to see where when and who is playing

user_stories.action: to be able to login into the app
user_stories.result: I can start helping customers

acceptance_criterions.description: The user will use a username and password provided by the administrator. And he/she will not be able to modify it.

user_stories.action: to be able to create users
user_stories.result: they can sell tickets at the concert and use the app

acceptance_criterions.description: CONSTRAINT. This assumes an admin role in charge of assigning user to the selling stuff members. This does not seem to be provided by the current API, So we suggest building a small backend for this web only.
